title: Gregory Peck - His Own Man
brief_description: In Hollywood where many actors scramble for success - and are desperate to hold onto it - Gregory peck has taken chances. While he has become one of Hollywood’s most illustrious stars (49 movies in 39 years) Peck has always remained his own man. Rated: PG
